definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_replace_sphere" inline="false"><comment pinned="false" h="114" w="249">This block represents a blob feature that replaces netherrack with blackstone, like the ones that generate in the Nether.This feature should be generated during the UNDERGROUND_DECORATION stage</comment><value name="targetState"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.STONE#0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block being replaced (in this case netherrack)</comment></block></value><value name="newState"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Chalk</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that will be placed by the feature (in this case blackstone)</comment></block></value><value name="radius"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">12</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate up to 25 blackstone blobs in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">50</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><next><block type="placement_height_triangular"><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">-265</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">265</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
